name: MusicalChairs
0:
”Alexa, play Musical Chairs”
”Alexa, start Musical Chairs”
”Alexa, launch Musical Chairs”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical chairs
des:
Musical chairs is a game where a number of chairs, one fewer than the number of players, are arranged facing outward with the players standing in a circle just outside the chairs.
Ask Alexa to play Musical Chairs and start in walking around the chairs. When the music stops each player attempts to sit down in one of the chairs. The player who is left without a chair is eliminated from the game. One chair is then removed/eliminated to ensure that there will always be one fewer chair than there are players.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
